JUDGES: Anatoly Kovler;Christos Rozakis;Dean Spielmann;George Nicolaou;Giorgio Malinverni;Khanlar Hajiyev;Sverre Erik Jebens
TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE , a town in LOC . She is represented before the ORG by PERSON , a lawyer practising in PERSON . ORG are represented by PERSON and then by PERSON , ORG at ORG .
As a child , the applicant was imprisoned by the NORP . In DATE she hoped to receive compensation from ORG , a charity set up by the NORP and ORG .
The ORG refused compensation , and the applicant brought an action against it . On DATE ORG of GPE ordered the ORG to :

“ [ M]ake payments to [ the applicant ] in accordance with the Government ’s Decree No . CARDINAL of CARDINAL DATE “ On the adoption of the Rules on the conditions and procedure of the payment of compensation to victims of the NORP ” . ”
On DATE the judgment became binding , but was not immediately enforced because at that time the ORG lacked funds .

On DATE the ORG informed the applicant that it was going to pay her the equivalent MONEY converted into MONEY , and asked the applicant for her bank details . The applicant contested this offer , alleging that the amount was too small , and that currency conversion would make it even smaller .

The applicant applied for a clarification of the judgment , but on DATE ORG rejected this request having found that the judgment was worded clearly . The applicant did not appeal against this decision .

ORG operates on the basis of ORG no . CARDINAL of DATE . According to section CARDINAL of this Order , the amount of compensation is determined by the ORG ’s Experts’ ORG . The ORG ’s decision may be appealed against to the ORG ’s ORG , whose decision shall be final .
